import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const AddClient = () => { const [nama, setNama] = useState(""); const [fileName, setFileName] = useState(""); const onChangeFile = (e) => { setFileName(e.target.files[0]); }; const changeOnClick = (e) => { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("nama", nama); formData.append("gambar", fileName); axios .post("http://localhost:8080/clients/add", formData) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (
